tool_description: This API allows you to download any YouTube video in mp3 or mp4 by generating a customizable button to put on your site !
name: FREE MP3-MP4 YOUTUBE
title: FREE MP3-MP4 YOUTUBE

api_list.name: YouTube Button
api_list.description: Generate a button with the link to the downloadable video

required_parameters.name: loading_color
required_parameters.description: Color of the loading in hexadecimal

required_parameters.name: text_title
required_parameters.description: Put the title of the video in the button

required_parameters.name: text_color
required_parameters.description: The color of the button text in hexadecimal

required_parameters.name: text_title_color
required_parameters.description: The title of the color video in hexadecimal

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text that will appear in the button

required_parameters.name: button_color
required_parameters.description: Color of the button in hexadecimal
